## Just Shapes & Beats - A Unique Rhythm Based Game

Are you looking for a game that combines strategy, rhythm, and reaction time to create an addictive gameplay experience? Then Just Shapes &amp; Beats is the perfect game for you! **Developed by Berzerk Studio**, Just Shapes &amp; Beats is a *rhythm-based* game that was released on May 31, 2018. This game is available on many popular platforms, including Nintendo Switch, PC, PlayStation 4, and Xbox One.

### The Gameplay

Just Shapes &amp; Beats is all about timing and rhythm. The game takes place in a colorful world where the player controls a shape or a beat. The objective of the game is to avoid various obstacles such as lasers, spikes, and other hazards. The game features various levels with different difficulties, each with its own unique soundtrack. The player needs to time their moves with the beat of the music, creating a thrilling and unique gameplay experience.

As the player progresses through the levels, the obstacles become more complex. The soundtrack changes frequently, which keeps the game interesting and challenging. In addition to the main game, Just Shapes &amp; Beats also features a challenging boss battle mode.

### The Graphics

Just Shapes &amp; Beats has an incredible visual design. The game features a neon-colored world with shapes and beats that are constantly moving and changing. The graphics are simple but effective, and the vibrant colors make the game appealing to players of all ages.

### The Soundtrack

Just Shapes &amp; Beats features a mesmerizing soundtrack that is sure to get players in the mood to play. The game features music from various indie artists, creating a diverse and unique soundtrack that changes with each level. The music is a crucial element of the gameplay, as players need to time their moves with the beat of the music.

### The Conclusion

Just Shapes &amp; Beats is a *must-play* game for anyone who likes rhythm-based games or challenging gameplay. The game is easy to learn but hard to master, making it a suitable choice for both casual and hardcore gamers. The game's vibrant graphics, mesmerizing soundtrack, and unique gameplay make it an addictive and exciting experience. So, if you haven't tried Just Shapes &amp; Beats, be sure to give it a try!
